member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.FormExtensions.IsCurrentVirtualDesktop(System.Windows.Forms.Form)
member.summary: Determines whether this form is on the current virtual desktop.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.FormExtensions.MoveToDesktop(System.Windows.Forms.Form,WindowsDesktop.VirtualDesktop)
member.summary: Moves a form to the specified virtual desktop.

member.name: M:WindowsDesktop.FormExtensions.GetCurrentDesktop(System.Windows.Forms.Form)
member.summary: Returns the virtual desktop this form is located on.
